sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { quizAPI, leaderboardAPI } from '../services/api'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalQuizzes: 0, recentAttempts: [], totalAttempts: 0, uniqueQuizzesTaken: 0, }); const [availableQuizzes, setAvailableQuizzes] = useState([]); const [topPerformers, setTopPerformers] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData(); }, []); const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { const [quizzesResponse, historyResponse, historySummaryResponse, topPerformersResponse] = await Promise.all([ quizAPI.getAvailableQuizzes(), quizAPI.getUserHistory(), quizAPI.getUserHistorySummary(), leaderboardAPI.getTopPerformers(5), ]); setAvailableQuizzes(quizzesResponse.data); setStats({ totalQuizzes: quizzesResponse.data.length, recentAttempts: historyResponse.data.slice(0, 5), totalAttempts: historySummaryResponse.data.reduce((acc, quiz) => acc + quiz.attemptCount, 0), uniqueQuizzesTaken: historySummaryResponse.data.length, }); setTopPerformers(topPerformersResponse.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard data:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const formatDate = (dateString) => { return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric', hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit', }); }; const getScoreColor = (score, totalQuestions) => { const percentage = (score / (totalQuestions * 1)) * 100; // Assuming 1 mark per question if (percentage >= 80) return 'text-success'; if (percentage >= 60) return 'text-warning'; return 'text-danger'; }; if (loading) { return (
Loading...
); } return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome back, {user?.username}!

Ready to challenge yourself with some quizzes?

{/* Stats Cards */}

{stats.totalQuizzes}

Available Quizzes

{stats.totalAttempts}

Total Attempts

{stats.uniqueQuizzesTaken}

Quizzes Taken

{stats.recentAttempts.length > 0 ? Math.max(...stats.recentAttempts.map(a => a.score)) : 0}

Best Score

{stats.recentAttempts.length > 0 ? Math.round( stats.recentAttempts.reduce((acc, curr) => acc + (curr.correctAnswers / curr.totalQuestions) * 100, 0 ) / stats.recentAttempts.length ) : 0}%

Average Score

{/* Available Quizzes */}
Available Quizzes
View All
{availableQuizzes.length === 0 ? (

No quizzes available at the moment.

) : (
{availableQuizzes.slice(0, 4).map((quiz) => (
{quiz.title}

{quiz.description || 'No description available'}

{quiz.durationMinutes} mins Start
))}
)}
{/* Recent Activity */}
Recent Activity
View All
{stats.recentAttempts.length === 0 ? (

No quiz attempts yet.

) : (
{stats.recentAttempts.map((attempt) => (
{attempt.quizTitle}

Score: {attempt.score}/{attempt.totalQuestions}

{formatDate(attempt.completedAt)}
View
))}
)}
{/* Top Performers */}
Top Performers
View Full Leaderboard
{topPerformers.length === 0 ? (

No top performers yet. Be the first!

) : (
{topPerformers.map((performer, index) => (
{index === 0 && 🥇} {index === 1 && 🥈} {index === 2 && 🥉} {index > 2 && (
#{index + 1}
)}
{performer.username}
{performer.totalQuizzes} quiz{performer.totalQuizzes !== 1 ? 'es' : ''} {Math.round(performer.overallPercentage)}%
))}
)}
{/* Quick Actions */}
Quick Actions
Take a Quiz View History Leaderboard
); }; export default Dashboard;
